attributes.action: Review the Income Tax arrangements for Executive Pensions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that any pension above £250,000 per annum paid to anyone (public sector or banking, whatever) is immoral and cannot be justified.  We call on the PM and Cancellor of the Exchequor to introduce a special tax of 80% on values between £50,000 and £100,000 and 95% on all values above £100,ooo pa. (Obviously, anyone NOT paying UK tax should not be allowed to collect any pension in excess of a state pension.)
